question:
Consider the following statements about the “Sangrai dance”:
  1. It is performed by the young boys and girls of the “Mog” tribal community.
  2. Sangrai is a special festival of Tripura state
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: “Sangrai dance” was performed for the first time in the Republic Day parade (69<sup>th</sup> Republic Day) by the tribal students from Tripura state. Sangrai is a special festival of Tripura state. This dance form is performed by the young boys and girls of the “Mog” tribal community.
